name: Shadow's Tale
description:
Shadow’s Tale is a top down camera game that focuses on overcoming challenges and fighting enemies. Gameplay depends on various mechanics that will help you fulfill your purpose of defeating any obstacles you see in your way.

This project was made by Team Noob Coders.

Team Members: 

  • Abdullah Al-Bukhari
  • Abdullah Al-Ghamdi
  • Ayman Al-Amoudi
  • Fahad Al-Qisy
  • Hamza Bahamdan
  • Huda Al-Marri
